title: fennic
author: fennic
content: Hi guys today I got into lending page. I saw this that some members are giving loans to people who have collateral. So I want to say that can someone get loan without collateral?I will be pleased to know about this.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Yes, but it's only for trusted users of the forum, not for everyone. You are not likely to get a loan without collateral(valid collateral only) unless someone is going to trust you for no reason.Darkstar_ provides no collateral loan and so does shasan and others but as I said only for trusted users of the fprum. You can check Darkstar_ thread to see who gets a loan without collateral- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3243635.0

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: When you become a high-ranking forum member with a good reputation, you can use your forum account as collateral for a loan. Forum loans are very hard to get, but if you qualify for one and make regular payments, it can help you build your credit history.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Don't even ask before you establish some solid history in the forum. Even after you do that people may not lend you any money without a valid collateral. If you ask for a loan without a collateral when you are a newbie, you may even get a negative trust rating which will ruin any future you will potentially have in this forum.The newbie people you see asking for a loan without a collateral are mostly scammers and will receive a negative trust rating sooner or later.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on October 06, 2022, 10:33:37 AMI'm wondering if @Stalker22 was meaning "use your reputation" as collateral? ðŸ¤”That is correct. I was a bit vague there. There are lenders who give loans without collateral, but only to trusted members of the forum, so in a sense, your forum account (that is, your reputation) serves as collateral.
